snippet: The Stanford sophomore Jordan Morris scored early in the second half in his first start for the United States national team, which dispatched Mexico, 2-0, in an exhibition game.
lead_paragraph: The Stanford sophomore Jordan Morris scored early in the second half in his first start for the United States national team, which dispatched Mexico, 2-0, in an exhibition game.

headline.main: College Player Paces U.S. Victory Over Mexico

keywords.name: organizations
